sentences.english: When the Worker-Peasant-Soldier Student graduated, a lot of them were assigned to the original units or provinces where they had worked in.
sentences.chinese: 工农兵学员毕业后，多被分配到原单位或原省份工作。

sentences.english: In the fInal analysis, the strength In russia was on the side of the Soviets of Workers, Peasants and Soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 归根结蒂，俄国的力量是在工农兵苏维埃这方面。

sentences.english: Workers, peasants and soldiers march forward bravely. The Great Revolution surges high.
sentences.chinese: 工农兵奋勇前进，大革命汹涌澎湃。

sentences.english: We should always perform before the workers, peasants and soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该经常为工农兵演出。

sentences.english: Our literary and art workers must take the road of integrating with the workers, peasants and soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 我们的文艺工作者必须走与工农兵相结合的道路。

sentences.english: Intellectuals should identify with the workers, peasants and soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 知识分子应该和工农兵打成一片。
